titles.title: A resolution designating the week of September 6 through September 10, 2021, as "National Historically Black Colleges and Universities Week".
A resolution designating the week of September 6 through September 10, 2021, as "National Historically Black Colleges and Universities Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates the week of September 6-September 10, 2021, as National Historically Black Colleges and Universities Week.
